entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is mentioned as the main event of the tournament, where students are supposed to get to know foreign wizards and make friends with them.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is participating in the Yule Ball. She is mentioned as being hot-tempered and having a problem with Ron's behavior.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who is also participating in the Yule Ball. He is mentioned as being competitive and ignoring Harry's attempts to reason with him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is participating in the Yule Ball. He is mentioned as trying to reason with Ron and calm him down.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a foreign wizard who is participating in the Yule Ball. Hermione is mentioned as going with him, which causes tension between her and Ron.

entities.name: vicky
entities.description: Vicky is another name for Viktor Krum, a foreign wizard participating in the Yule Ball. Ron is scolded by Hermione for calling him Vicky instead of his proper name.

entities.name: padma
entities.description: Padma is a student who is participating in the Yule Ball. She asks Ron to dance, but he refuses and gets angry with Hermione instead.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is a student who is participating in the Yule Ball. She joins Padma and the Beauxbatons boy, along with another friend conjured up by him.

entities.name: beauxbatons boy
entities.description: The Beauxbatons boy is a foreign wizard participating in the Yule Ball. He conjures up one of his friends to join Parvati and Padma.

relationships.description: Hermione is going with Krum at the Yule Ball, which causes tension between her and Ron.
Ron is in conflict with Hermione due to her decision to go with Krum at the Yule Ball.
Padma asks Ron to dance, but he refuses and gets angry with Hermione instead.
